Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
@Alright I shielded, mined 1 block and got:
```JSON
computergenie@debian:~/pkomodo/src$ ./komodo-cli -ac_name=RKT listunspent | jq '.[]|{generated,spendable,confirmations}'
{
  "generated": true,
  "spendable": true,
  "confirmations": 1
}
computergenie@debian:~/pkomodo/src$ ./komodo-cli -ac_name=RKT getbalance
256.00020000```
So, it does seem to take 0 blocks on top here
